Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: An Orison to the Virgin — nine 8-line stanzas

Longleat29.First Lines:
Myghtffull mari y crownyd queneemperesse off heuene and
                    helle…
Longleat29.Last Lines:
…þat is ȝour sone & ȝou by twenehelpe me
                    lady ffull off grace Amen ffor charite
Longleat29.Note:
Text copied by second scribe on folios left blank by first scribe; f.
                        144v is blank.
